name: Car & Driver Presents: Grand Tour Racing '98
name_original: Car & Driver Presents: Grand Tour Racing '98
description:
Car & Driver Presents: Grand Tour Racing '98 (Total Drivin in Europe and Oceania, M6 Turbo Racing in France and Gekisou!! Grand Racing in Japan) is a racing game developed by Eutechnyx.
This game had different soundtracks for the PAL (Total Drivin) and NTSC (Grand Tour Racing '98 and Gekisou!! Grand Racing) Versions
